movie_title: Can AI solve crime? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Could artificial intelligence be used to solve a murder? For audio and transcript downloads, a quiz

vocabulary.definition: a person whose job is to discover information about crimes and solve them
vocabulary.example: Sherlock Holmes is a famous fictional detective known for his brilliant deductions.

vocabulary.definition: the area in which someone has the most work experience or knowledge
vocabulary.example: Her background in computer science helped her excel in the tech industry.

vocabulary.definition: a new interest or activity in a particular topic or area
vocabulary.example: There has been a renaissance in traditional cooking methods in modern cuisine.
Vinyl records were out of favour for many years before making a comeback recently.

vocabulary.definition: information that is presented as it is happening
vocabulary.example: The real-time traffic updates on the app helped me choose the fastest route.
